title: Walmart  IN3 vs Cyware vs Contlo
content:
Education: B.Tech in Computer Science from a Tier-3 college
Years of Experience: 4.1
Prior Experience: Adobe
Current TC : 11 L (Base) + 1 L (Bonus) + 10K USD RSU  ~ 20 LPA

Company: Walmart
Title/Level: IN3 - Software Engineer III
Location: Bangalore, KA
Salary (Base): 25L
Retirals : 1.2 L
Joining Bonus: Nil
RSUs: 25% of Base, vested over 3 years
New Hire Stock :  6.25 LPA vested over 3 years
Bonus: 20% of Base, every year
Total comp (Salary +Retirals + Bonus + Stock): ~35L
Benefits: Standard walmart benefits
Other details: Tried for hiking up base but offer is non-negotiable from Walmart's end (expected) 




Company: Cyware
Title/Level: SDET 2
Location:Bangalore
Base Salary: INR 1900000
Performance Bonus: 1LPA
Stock bonus: 10 LPA every years (Paper money as not listed)
Total comp (Salary +Bonus + Stock): ~30L
Relocation Bonus : None


Company: Contlo - AI startup
Title/Level: SDET 
Location:Bangalore
Base Salary: INR 2200000
Performance Bonus: 10% of base fixed
Stock bonus: 50000 INR every years (Paper money as not listed)
Relocation Bonus : None
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~25L

title: Deutsche Bank Graduate Analyst - Fresher
content:
* **Education**: B. Tech  CSE 
* **Prior Experience**: 2 months intern at GS
* **Date of Offer**: November 2023
* **Company**: Deutsche Bank
* **Title/Level**: Full Time - Graduate Analyst (SDE-I)
* **Location Preference**: Pune/Bengaluru
* **Base Salary**: INR 16,50,000
* **Signing Bonus**: INR 3,50,000
* **Performance Bonus**: 2,28,000 rupees.
* **Rentention Bonus**: 2,50,000 (Year 1) + 4,00,000 (Year 2)
* **Other Bonus** -  Incentive: INR 1,75,000
* **Total compensation**: INR = Approx 20,00,000
* **Benefits**: Standard benefits
* **Other details**: On Campus Offer
